metadata.title: CVE-2024-26980 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:ksmbd: fix slab-out-of-bounds in smb2_allocate_rsp_bufIf ->ProtocolId is SMB2_TRANSFORM_PROTO_NUM, smb2 request sizevalidation could be skipped. if request size is smaller thansizeof(struct smb2_query_info_req), slab-out-of-bounds read can happen insmb2_allocate_rsp_buf(). This patch allocate response buffer afterdecrypting transform request. smb3_decrypt_req() will validate transformrequest size and avoid slab-out-of-bound in smb2_allocate_rsp_buf().
